definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: It refers to the formation of new words by adding affixes to other words or morphemes.
sentences.chinese: 将词缀加入其他单词或词素以构成新词的方法。

sentences.english: Do it again on the new word and make the best use of your vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 当遇到新词的时候就这样做，充分利用好你的词汇表。

sentences.english: Right now we're going to introduce the word sound engineer.
sentences.chinese: 现在要教大家一个新词录音师。

sentences.english: A new wine cup last year old pavilions, weather.
sentences.chinese: 一曲新词酒一杯，去年天气旧亭台。

sentences.english: You can teach the pockets some new words during the process.
sentences.chinese: 在教育过程您能教口袋一些新词语。

sentences.english: Utilize the synthetic method to form neologisms .
This is a new dictionary. I bought it yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本新词高考资源网典，我昨天买的。

sentences.english: This article approaches neologism from the angle of semantic extension.
sentences.chinese: 从语义泛化角度探讨新词语。

sentences.english: Space science has introduced many new words.
sentences.chinese: 太空科学采用许多新词汇。

sentences.english: In the third chapter, we analyze the new words and new senses of ZHUANJIBAIYUANJING.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分分析《撰集百缘经》的新词新义。

sentences.english: It promiscuously plunders other languages and delights in neologisms .
sentences.chinese: 它杂乱地掠夺其它语言，并以增加新词为乐。

sentences.english: I was very impressed by the report's neologism: "Wikipedia kids".
sentences.chinese: “维基一代”这个新词给我留下了深刻的印象。

sentences.english: This thesis makes a study on Chinese neologism translation into English.
sentences.chinese: 本文旨在对汉语新词的英译进行相关的研究。

sentences.english: A new wine cup last year old pavilions, weather. When the sunset?
sentences.chinese: 一曲新词酒一杯，去年天气旧亭台。夕阳西下几时回？

definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
names of the tunes to which 詞|词[ci2] poems are composed
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
variant of 詞彙|词汇[ci2 hui4]
rhyming word ending a line of verse/rhyme
to rhyme/sometimes written 壓韻|压韵
